column4: Can someone explain to me how I am running ubuntu 9.10 and gpodder is v0.16.1 when the gpodder website tells me the latest version is 2.1???
The new version of Ubuntu coming out in April has 2.1.
0.16 was added to Karmic (released in October). Jaunty (last April) had 0.14.
from the look of the website, they went straight from 0.16 to 2.0 for some reason, so it's actually not old :)
that explains my frustration with uploading my key to github
which one do you want to make? I can link you to guides for either...
I need a ssh signing key for github the other key/s I've already got
no problem. Let me know if that link isn't clear :)
created the key thanks the guide was simple
I've entered the pub key into the form on github but it's still processing after about 3 minutes surely it should have gone through or rejected by now?
no idea. I've never used github :(
okay guess I'll just leave it running then
